 }

diff --git a/mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs b/mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs
index c83f10daa..5c32dc089 100644
--- a/mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs
+++ b/mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs
@@ -1795,11 +1795,19 @@ namespace mRemoteNG.UI.Window
                 }
 
                 tabPage.ShowClosedState();
-                // Re-focus the tab so that disposing the protocol control does not shift
-                // focus to the first tab (issue #1645).
-                tabPage.DockHandler.Activate();
-                if (closedConnectionInfo != null)
-                    FrmMain.Default.SelectedConnection = closedConnectionInfo;
+                if (ReferenceEquals(connDock.ActiveContent, tabPage))
+                {
+                    // Re-focus the tab so that disposing the protocol control does not shift
+                    // focus to the first tab (issue #1645).
+                    tabPage.DockHandler.Activate();
+                    if (closedConnectionInfo != null)
+                        FrmMain.Default.SelectedConnection = closedConnectionInfo;
+                }
+                else
+                {
+                    // Tab is in the background â€” notify user without stealing focus (#1895).
+                    tabPage.HasUnreadActivity = true;
+                }
                 return;
             }
